settings.title: General
settings.minimizeToTrayDescription: Minimize to system tray when closing the window

panel.title: Panel
panel.searchText: Search sites or use a search engine...
panel.importSuccessMessage: Successfully imported {{groupCount}} groups and {{itemCount}} website items.
panel.groupDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of this group
panel.deleteGroupMessagePrefix: Are you sure you want to delete
panel.deleteGroupMessageSuffix: ? This will also delete all websites under this group and cannot be undone.
panel.addDescription: Enter a brief description of the website...

iconSource.iconifyUsage: Uses Iconify icons, in the format like:

panel.errorInvalidDefaultUrl: Invalid default URL format. Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com).
panel.errorInvalidIntranetUrl: Invalid intranet URL format. Please enter a valid URL, or leave it blank if not needed.

searchEngine.searchPlaceholderHint: Use %s as a placeholder for the search term. It can be omitted if the query keyword is at the end of the URL.
searchEngine.confirmDeleteSearchEngine: Are you sure you want to delete the search engine {{name}}?
searchEngine.duplicateNameMessage: A search engine with the same name already exists. Please use a different name.
searchEngine.emptyNameOrUrl: Name and URL template cannot be empty.

asset.totalAssetsDesc: The total number of asset items you currently own.
asset.totalValueDesc: The sum of the current value of all assets.
asset.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the asset "{{assetName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
asset.noAssetsSuggestion: Please try changing your search terms or adding a new asset.
asset.name: Asset Name

category.title: Category Management
category.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{{categoryName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
category.deleteErrorMessage: Cannot delete this category as it is still in use by some assets.
category.errorDuplicateMessage: A category with this name already exists. Please use a different name.

asset.placeholderDescription: Enter a detailed description of the asset...

about.tagline: Tinkering is not just about solving problems; it's about discovering joy and growth in the process.

checkUpdatePage.title: Check for Updates
checkUpdatePage.description: Keep your app up to date for the latest features and security fixes.
checkUpdatePage.downloadFinishedMessage: The update has been downloaded. Restart now to complete the installation?
checkUpdatePage.downloadFailedMessage: An error occurred during the download. Please check your network connection and try again.
checkUpdatePage.latestVersion: You are on the latest version.
checkUpdatePage.checkFailedMessage: Failed to check for updates. Please try again later.

account.title: Login
account.loggedInMessage: You are logged in. Data synchronization is ready.
account.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please check your network or server address.

httpsWarning.title: Security Warning
httpsWarning.message: Disabling SSL (HTTPS) will transmit your password in plaintext, which can be easily intercepted by network sniffers. Are you sure you want to proceed?

account.claimMustLogin: Data claim must be performed under a logged-in user.
account.claimSuccessMessage: Your local data has been successfully linked to the current account. Some page data may require a refresh to be fully displayed.
account.retryError: Operation failed, please try again later. Error
account.confirmActionMessage: This action will transfer ownership of all local data created while offline to the currently logged-in account. Are you sure you want to continue?
account.deleteUserMessage: This will remove the local account "{{username}}" and all of its data (navigation, assets, search engines, sync history, etc.). This action cannot be undone.
account.deleteUserFailed: Failed to delete account. Please try again later.

actions.primaryDesc: Login, claim, or sync your current account data.
actions.dangerDesc: Completely remove the local account and related data. Proceed with caution.

account.serverAddressHint: Will be used for sync and all server requests after saving.
account.serverAddressInvalid: Please enter a full address with http/https prefix.

sync.accountDeletedOnServer: Account removed on the server. Signing out and cleaning local data...
sync.accountDeletedCleanupDone: The account was removed on the server; local data has been cleared.
sync.accountDeletedCleanupFailed: The account was removed on the server, but local cleanup failed: {{error}}
sync.accountDisabledOnServer: The account is disabled on the server. Signing out (data kept).
sync.accountDisabledSignedOut: The account was disabled; signed out locally. Data remains intact.
sync.accountDisabledSignoutFailed: The account was disabled, but local sign-out failed: {{error}}
sync.tokenExpiredOnServer: Token expired on the server. Signing out. {{reason}}
sync.tokenExpiredSignedOut: Token expired; signed out locally. Please log in again.
sync.tokenExpiredSignoutFailed: Token expired, but local sign-out failed: {{error}}
sync.serverUserUpdated: Server user information has changed, local user information has been updated!
sync.serverTooOld: Server version too low (current {{version}}, require >= {{required}}). Please upgrade the server.
